input.sentences: the day was really hot as the trick riders treated the crowd to a thrilling time .
one rider showed an entirely new trick which quickly caught on and was copied by other participants .
the world champion loved the new trick so much .
judges looked on and quickly tallied the points .
the winners changed into their swimsuits and celebrated their victories .
output.sentences: It was time for Jim to do a trick on his motorcycle.
Randy decided to do a backwards wheelie for his trick.
James saw Randy's trick and decided he could make his wheel go higher.
None of the judges looked impressed.
